Name: Gleancrawler
Text: ({B/G} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.)\nTrample\nAt the beginning of your end step, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

Name: Dimir Guildmage
Text: ({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.)\n{3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery.\n{3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
